topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Wiki
Topic :: Software Development :: Collaborative development tools

name: WikiPL
short_description: WikiPL is a collaborative programming web environment. Each article in the wiki is a function or class or any other piece of Python code. Through WikiPL you can publish, document, test, execute and evolve your code under a vivid wiki community.
